meanings.definition: The process of coating something with a layer of silver.
meanings.sent1: The silvering of the mirror made it reflective.
meanings.sent2: The silvering on the antique frame was starting to tarnish.
meanings.sent3: The silvering of the cake with edible silver flakes made it look luxurious.
meanings.sent4: The silvering of the lake under the moonlight created a magical shimmer.
meanings.sent5: The silvering of the jewelry added a touch of elegance to the outfit.

meanings.definition: The act of turning silver in color.
meanings.sent1: The silvering of the leaves in autumn was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The silvering of the hair gave him a distinguished look.
meanings.sent3: The silvering of the sky at dusk painted a serene picture.
meanings.sent4: The silvering of the clouds made them look like cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The silvering of the car's paint job made it stand out on the road.

meanings.definition: The application of a silver finish to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The silvering of the trophy made it gleam under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The silvering of the vase added a touch of sophistication to the room.
meanings.sent3: The silvering of the walls in the bathroom gave it a modern look.
meanings.sent4: The silvering of the statue made it appear more lifelike.
meanings.sent5: The silvering of the frame enhanced the beauty of the artwork.
